        <script><![CDATA[var contentPortalRec = new GlideRecord('sn_cd_content_portal');
if (contentPortalRec.get('ed89d1590b4013008cd6e7ae37673a6a')) {
	var bannerText = contentPortalRec.getValue('body_text');
	var expectedText = "Welcome to the single destination for all your HR service needs";
	if (bannerText === expectedText) {
		contentPortalRec.setValue("body_text","Welcome to the single destination for all employee needs");
		contentPortalRec.update();
	}
}]]></script>
